titles: The York-shire spaw, or, A treatise of foure famous medicinal wells viz. the spaw, or vitrioline-well, the stinking, or sulphur-well, the dropping, or petrifying-well, and S. Mugnus-well, near Knare borow in York-shire : together with the causes, vertues and use thereof : for farther information read the contents / composed by J. French, Dr. of Physick.
author: French, John, 1616-1657.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Mineral waters --  Therapeutic use --  Early works to 1800.
